oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crises - Barnacles of Dispute Slow the Ship
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; desegregation; Memphis City Schools;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article from the November 28, 1968, edition of "The Commercial Appeal," written by David Vincent, chronicling efforts at integration in the Memphis area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vincent, David
